tool_description: The ultimate spelling checker for your text, ensuring error-free content every time. Unleash the power of multilingual spell-checking with our API.

api_list.name: SpellCheckProEndpoint
api_list.description: The /check_spelling endpoint is used to check the spelling of a given text. It takes a JSON object with a single property, text, which is a string of the text to be spell checked. The endpoint returns a JSON object with a single property, misspelled, which is an array of strings representing the misspelled words found in the input text. The endpoint supports specifying a language code ("lang_code") as an optional query parameter to check the spelling for specific languages.

optional_parameters.name: lang_code
optional_parameters.description: Language code to specify the language for spell checking.
